DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Whole genome shotgun sequencing and somatic mutations data in Hepatocellular carcinoma
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: Hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) is the most common malignancy of the liver. Genomic analysis is conducted to identify genetic alterations in driver genes which are all druggable targets for cancer therapy.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: Hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) is the most common malignancy of the liver. Genomic analysis is conducted to identify genetic alterations in driver genes which are all druggable targets for cancer therapy.
DESCRIPTOR.CENTER_PROJECT_NAME: 5WGS and 35WES sample pairs belongs to COCA-CN
